Dashboard1.Name: Dashboard 1
Dashboard1.textTemplateDifferentRegion: The profits were highest in <HighestProfitRegion>, standing at <HighestProfit>. The quantity shipped of <HighestQuantity> was highest in <HighestQuantityRegion> and the sales were highest in <HighestSalesRegion>.
Dashboard1.textTemplateSameRegion: The best performing region was <HighestSalesRegion>, with the sales being at <HighestSales>, the quantity shipped was <HighestQuantity> and the profits were recorded to be <HighestProfit>.
Dashboard1.textTemplateCategory: The sales were highest in the <HighestSalesCategory> and were recorded to be at <HighestSalesNumCategory>.
